dataStorage.paragraph: {{companyName}} uses third party providers and hosting partners to provide the hardware, software, networking, storage and related technology necessary to operate {{companyName}}. {{companyName}} owns the code, databases and all rights to the {{companyName}} application.

security.title: Security
security.paragraph: We take precautions to ensure the security of your personal information. However, we cannot guarantee that hackers or unauthorized personnel will gain access to your personal information despite our efforts. Please note that when you use the {{companyName}} service, your data will be transferred via third-party infrastructures that are not under our control. We cannot protect, and this Privacy Policy does not apply to, any information you transmit to other users. You should never share personal or identifying information with other users.
